thread.section_title: Skipper (formerly Jetaport) Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Skipper (formerly Jetaport) | hiskipper.com
thread.title: Sam Gottlich
thread.title_full: Skipper (formerly Jetaport) reviewed by Sam Gottlich

author: Sam Gottlich
title: Sam Gottlich
text: Working with Skipper was one of the easiest things I did while planning my wedding. We were able to find hotels close to our venue, and then let Skipper do the rest. Truly a hassle-free, stress-relieving service that I would recommend to everyone planning a group gathering.
